• BOOKS BY KENZIE JAMES •

  • HARKER

    Lily is looking to get off-world and fast. Sure, the ship is a bit of a fixer-upper, but Captain Harker doesn't seem like he's only in it for the credits. Not long after taking off, the Peacekeepers board us and Harker announced that she's his mate.

    Harker knows the Terran is trouble from the moment he lays eyes on her, but she's desperate. He only said she was his mate to keep her from being dragged back to whoever she is running from, but the longer she's on his ship, the more he's realizing she could be his.

    CW/TW

    Violence, Explicit sex scenes, Parental death (Off-page), Weapons, Burns, Injury, Space travel, Human trafficking (Off-page), Horns as handlebars, Oral sex, Mating bite

  • THE TEDDY BEAR'S PRIZE
